original_text: Then Saul fell at once full length on the ground, filled with fear because of the words of Samuel. And there was no strength in him, for he had eaten nothing all day and all night.
korean_text: 사울이 갑자기 땅에 완전히 엎드러지니 이는 사무엘의 말로 말미암아 심히 두려워함이요 또 그의 기력이 다하였으니 이는 그가 하루 밤낮을 음식을 먹지 못하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: Then Saul fell at once full length on the ground
filled with fear because of the words of Samuel
And there was no strength in him
for he had eaten nothing all day and all night
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 종일 밤낮을 아무것도 먹지 않았기 때문이다
